sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Box, Heading, Input, InputGroup, InputRightElement, Button, Menu, MenuButton, MenuList, MenuItem, Icon, Flex, Accordion, AccordionItem, AccordionButton, AccordionPanel, AccordionIcon, RangeSlider, RangeSliderTrack, RangeSliderFilledTrack, RangeSliderThumb, Text, List, ListItem, ListIcon, VStack, Divider, } from "@chakra-ui/react"; import { FaStar } from "react-icons/fa"; import { SearchIcon, ChevronDownIcon } from "@chakra-ui/icons"; const ChannelDashboard = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(""); const items = [ { id: 1, name: "Математика" }, { id: 2, name: "Физика" }, { id: 3, name: "Биология" }, { id: 4, name: "Информатика" }, { id: 5, name: "История" }, ]; const handleSearch = (event) => { setSearchTerm(event.target.value); }; const filteredItems = items.filter((item) => item.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); return ( Filters } mt={6}> Actions Download Create a Copy Mark as Draft Delete Attend a Workshop Tags

Section 1 title

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Section 2 title

ER, % Subscribers CPV {filteredItems.map((item) => ( {item.name} {item.description} {item.category} ))} ); }; export default ChannelDashboard;
